comment.author: 22221063@N07
comment._content: Did you know that the blue wall be behind Reagan was bullet proof! Behind him is Soviet controlled East Berlin. Snipers could have easly taken a shot if they could.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: That's a great factoid! It is indeed a powerful image with the graffiti of the Berlin Wall just behind the podium. -Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
